Fondations

Cr√©er un th√®me

$brand-tokens: (
  surface-bg: #fdf7ff,
  surface-card: #ffffff,
  surface-muted: #f1e9ff,
  text-strong: #1a1024,
  text-default: #2b1a3a,

  border-strong: #c8b7ec,

  status-info: #22cbdc,
  status-success: #22c55e,
  status-warning: #f59e0b,
  status-danger: #ef4444
);

[data-theme="brand"] {
  @include tokens.apply-theme($brand-tokens);
}
